Thank you for this! I have this on VHS, but have been wanting it on DVD for ages!

Just a head's up regarding English subtitles -- These worked very well for me:

http://subscene.com/a-clockwork-orange/subtitles-10.aspx

Just look for "English", uploaded by Bassemrr.

I only watched the 1st half of the movie, and those subtitles lined up with the scenes very well. Occasionally, a few words were omitted, but nothing major.

I'm going to watch the movie in its entirety now, so if I find anything funky with those subs, I'll let y'all know. :)

Thanks again, iamweasel, for this wonderful classic!
